Head out your door and enjoy the best of what Bethesda and the Metropolitan DC Area have to offer!
description.space:
Apartment is fully furnished and utilities, cable, WiFi and off-street parking are all included. Please note: This listing is intended for one guest only. An extra guest fee of $50 will apply automatically on selecting two guests.

The apartment has 1 queen size bed, a large closet and full bathtub. 

You are welcome to park on our driveway, or we can obtain a visitor's permit for street parking. 

The unit has a dedicated washer and dryer unit. Cleaning during your stay is available for a small charge, if you want.

Long-term stays are preferred.
description.access:
Guests have full use of this space, plus access to the backyard and grill. 

Guests have access to two off-street parking spots. 

Location is an easy walk to stores, restaurants, metro and NIH and Walter Reed.
description.neighborhood:
We live in a charming residential neighborhood at the very edge of downtown Bethesda, an area known for its easy DC access, restaurants and shopping.

Bethesda is a thriving community that is home to families from around the globe. There is a robust Farmer's market on the weekends, and there are many locally owned businesses, art galleries, bakeries and restaurants. A short walk will take you to cuisines from around the world - Indian, Ethiopian, French, Cajun, Mexican, Eritrean, Italian, Lebanese, Greek, Korean, Thai, Chinese, Japanese and more! We support locally owned businesses and will happily help you discover the richness of all Bethesda has to offer.
description.transit:
Within a 5-block radius, you will find the new Trader Joe's, Marriott HQ, Harris Teeter, CVS pharmacy, top restaurants, bars, jazz clubs, and more. A 15-20-minute walk (or the free Bethesda Circulator), will take you to downtown Bethesda - perfect for shopping, movies and fine dining. We are a 15-minute walk to two metro stations (both red line), NIH, and Walter Reed/Navy Medical Center and a 20-minute subway ride to downtown DC.

For get-aways and farther commutes, we are conveniently located just inside the 495-beltway and I-270. A 45-minute drive will take you to historic towns like Alexandria, Frederick, Annapolis and the Chesapeake Bay, and Sandy Springs, heart of the Underground Railroad.
description.interaction: One of us is typically home during the day and available if you need anything. We are excited to host you and orient you to the area. With your own entrance and amenities, you will be free to come and go as you please.
description.house_rules: Quiet hours are from 10 pm to 7 am

name: Fine Art, Garden Views; Walk to Shops/Dining/Metro
title: Bethesda, Maryland

gallery.caption: 100% cotton duvet cover washed after every guest.
Beds can be joined to make one king-width bed. (With advance notice.)
Dining table area of the "mini great room."
View from sitting at dining table.
Your private entrance at the front of the house.
The "mini great room" living area and dining area.  The kitchenette is to the right outside of this picture.
Entrance to the balcony is from Bedroom 1
City skyline view, but far enough so that it’s quiet here.

hosts.about:
I enjoy continually improving the space so that each guest feels like the first guest.  I've done much of the renovation work myself, and it has been a labor of love!  I also make sure to comply with all local laws regarding renting and I was even involved in the creation of the county ordinance for short term rentals!  That was an interesting process, and it really makes a difference that I live on the premises. 

My philosophy as a host is to provide as much privacy as the guest would like, while also being always available as I live in another section of the house.  

I love being an Airbnb Host as it has been a very happy experience to meet (or text with!) such delightful guests, and it has allowed me to continue living in this wonderful (and unfortunately very expensive) neighborhood.  I have lived in this house for over 25 years, raising two sons, and now it feels very natural to share this great location with travelers from all over the world.  

My favorite activities are hiking in the surprisingly scenic surroundings of DC or spending time outside gardening.  I do spend a good deal of time on my computer as I’m a website designer with a home-based business.   

I love to travel and I've lived in France and Russia, starting out in both places without speaking the language so I know what it's like not to understand what people are saying.  Eventually I became fluent, and then mostly forgot it all, but the lesson that stayed with me is that people can always find a way to communicate.

recent.comments: Great place…great location….overall a wonderful stay.

items.comments: Great place…great location….overall a wonderful stay.

Awesome place… awesome host.
If this Erika’s house is available don’t miss the chance: book it!

We spent time renting Erika's AirBnB while waiting for repairs to be completed on our condo about 20 minutes away. It's been a very stressful time, but as I said to Erika, living there felt like being on vacation. 

The master bedroom and bathroom are wonderful, the living room is super cozy, and she even made it possible for us to host a friend who needed to come to town for a funeral at the very last minute. 

What's more, it's in a cozy little house right next to downtown Bethesda, which means you're always a 10 minute walk away from 1,000 fun things to do or eat. 

I can't recommend this place enough. And if having a full kitchen instead of a kitchenette is a deal-breaker for you for some reason, you should make an exception if it means staying with Erika!

Wat een heerlijk verblijf hadden wij met z’n allen in dit prachtige huisje in een rustige wijk waar je wakker wordt van de vogels! 
Omdat we eerst met z’n vieren en nadien toch met z’n zessen kwamen, is Erika hier enorm flexibel mee omgesprongen en heeft twee extra bedden verzorgd. De kids konden prima met z’n allen op de grote kamer en wij met z’n tweeën op de kleinere kamer. Prachtig ingericht, van alle gemakken voorzien en alles was brandschoon! 
Vanaf het verblijf konden we makkelijk richting DC (we hadden een eigen auto die we op haar oprit konden parkeren) en hebben we genoten van fietstochten door het centrum en langs de mall. 
Mochten we ooit nog naar DC terug komen, dan zouden hier zeker weer boeken. Erika, hartelijk bedankt!

Comfortable, quiet  and super clean apartment/house. Erika was very accommodating and communicating with her was a breeze! Walking distance to metro (8mn) and to Bethesda town center. CVS and Trader Joes around the corner. Pretty street, very green and peaceful:) Would definitely recommend!

Erika was a great host! Always responsive no matter how many questions I had. The home was perfect for our weekend, we were very close to all our activities. The home was very clean and equipped with all you would need for a quick trip away from home.
We loved it!

This  was a FANTASTIC airbnb experience! Erika has obviously put a lot of thought into all the special touches in this home…comfy beds, super soft towels, snacks, coffee pods and tea in the kitchen, lovely artwork, a basket of doggie supplies for our pooch, super sized washer and dryer with laundry pods, etc. Erika lives on the premises and was responsive to all our questions and was very friendly and easy to work with. The place is spotless. The home is located very close to the metro, as well as many good restaurants and is on a beautiful, quiet street. We hope to book this place again when we visit Bethesda…thanks again, Erika!!

description.summary:
Fantastic location!  Quiet, private-entrance, separate apartment in my home just blocks from lovely downtown Bethesda, close to to NIH and Walter Reed, and easy access to DC by metro or scenic drive.  Private entrance, bright views, beautiful artwork, and comfortable amenities make for a happy visit.  Walk to Trader Joe's, shops, restaurants, and metro.

Same location as my other completely separate unit, also in my home, which has 5 star reviews!
description.space:
I've just remodeled this new two-level area of my home for guests to enjoy, just steps away from the city!  Close enough to walk, but far enough to have peace and quiet. 

On the first floor, there is a "mini great room" with a living room, kitchenette, and dining area.  Bedrooms are on the top floor of the house, so they are very quiet with no footsteps from above.   Bathrooms are newly remodeled. The entire space, including the first floor, stairs, hallway, bedrooms, bathrooms, and laundry room is private and for your use only.

All linens, including comforter and bath mats, are washed for each guest. Every surface is wiped clean with disinfecting wipes.  Everything in the space is for the use of guests.

Kitchenette has
• air fryer/microwave/convection oven combo,
• full-sized sink,
• mid-sized refrigerator with freezer, 
• compact dishwasher,
• Keurig coffee maker with supplies for tea and coffee, 
• teapot, 
• toaster,
• freestanding cooktops,
• rice maker upon request,
• and of course, dishes, pots, silverware, etc... 
-----------------------------------
Bedroom 1 has queen-sized bed, and bedroom 2 has two single beds that can be joined to make a bed the width of a king-sized bed (with advanced notice.)
Both bedrooms have:
• desks,
• tv/monitor,
• 100% cotton sheets,
• duvet covers washed for every guest,
• blackout curtains,
• alarm clocks,
• dresser drawers and closet rods,
• ceiling fans.
------------------------------------
Bathroom 1 (attached to Bedroom 1) has:
• double sink,  shower in a jacuzzi tub,
Bathroom 2 (accessible from the hallway) has:
• everything brand new, shower with rain shower head.
Both bathrooms have:
• clean shine through and through,
• bath mats washed for every guest,
• 100% cotton towels.
------------------------------------
Extras:
• large clothes-washing machine, 
• large clothes-dryer,
• drying rack,
• extra towels and extra sheets, 
• iron,
• ironing board,
• free Wifi,
• TV in every room with Amazon firestick or smart tv to play games, watch Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc...  (It also gets over-the-air television stations.)
• ps3 or wii with games upon request,
• parking upon request.
-------------------------------------
This two level suite comfortably accommodates a family, colleagues, or two couples. For extra guests, cot or Inflatable air mattresses are available with advanced notice.
description.access: No key required! Secure private entrance with keypad door bolt and your own private key code.   All of the available spaces and things are 100% for your use.
description.notes: Please let me know if you have any questions or special requests.  A happy guest is my top priority!
description.neighborhood:
Please click on my picture to read other reviews about this location because both units are in my house.  We are on a quiet residential street with friendly neighbors just off the busy streets of Bethesda.  Easy access to NIH, Walter Reed, and Washington DC museums/monuments. 

Blocks away from CVS, Starbucks, Trader Joe's, restaurants, boutique stores, farmer's markets, movie theater. 0.8 miles to NIH and Walter Reed.

8 minute walk to Bethesda Metro Station on the red line.

Driveway parking for one car.

Bike rental stand (Capital Bikeshare) is a few blocks away and you can ride on the Crescent Trail all the way to Georgetown and the DC museums/monuments.

Schools are Bethesda Elementary, Westland MIddle, and B-CC High School.
description.transit:
The Bethesda Metro Station is an 8-minute walk away, on the red line to downtown DC, museums and monuments.

If you have a car, you have a selection of scenic drives into DC, as well as easy access to the beltway

Take the metro to museums and monuments ( 8-10 stops depending on which museum you are going to.)  In addition to metro, you can walk to access the bus, free Bethesda circulator, Zip car, and rental car companies. 

Getting here: 30-45 minutes (check the traffic...) to all three international airports (IAD, BWI, and DCA.)  (DCA has the best access by metro, but there is uber/lyft to all the airports.) Two mile drive to the beltway (395 and 270) Bethesda metro is on the red line - goes straight to Union Station. Vamoose and Tripper both have nearby bus stops for New York City.

Parking is available with advance notice.
description.interaction: We are available anytime (call, text or email) and we're on the premises most of the time as we live in the house using a separate entrance.  100% privacy unless you have any questions or need some help. Let me know if you would like directions or suggestions about things to do.  I'm pretty much always available by text or email and we'll probably meet as I work in the garden.
description.house_rules:
Note that there is a glass cabinet so it may not be great for super rambunctious children.
Please contact me before using the fireplace.

hosts.about: We wish you a very nice stay at our cosy home!

recent.comments: Laurent’s home was the perfect place for our extended family gathering. Just walking into the house had kind of a special feeling, with all of the special garden features that were framing the front of the house - very European feeling.  The amount of space was perfect - everyone had their own bedroom AND bathroom. The kitchen had all the things needed to cook and we love to cook when we are on vacation. Even though Laurent was on vacation in a different time zone, he was very responsive to any questions we had. There were places for both the adults and the kids to enjoy their time. It didn’t feel like an Airbnb, it felt like a home.  The attention to detail that Laurent pays to many aspects of his Airbnb make it a very special place to stay.

items.comments: Laurent’s home was the perfect place for our extended family gathering. Just walking into the house had kind of a special feeling, with all of the special garden features that were framing the front of the house - very European feeling.  The amount of space was perfect - everyone had their own bedroom AND bathroom. The kitchen had all the things needed to cook and we love to cook when we are on vacation. Even though Laurent was on vacation in a different time zone, he was very responsive to any questions we had. There were places for both the adults and the kids to enjoy their time. It didn’t feel like an Airbnb, it felt like a home.  The attention to detail that Laurent pays to many aspects of his Airbnb make it a very special place to stay.

Laurent's home is spotless, private, friendly and gracious.  The kitchen, baths, bedrooms and great room were perfect for our family.  The large table that seated 12 was ideal for family meals and games. The wi-fi was strong and available throughout the home. Laurent was quickly responsive via email, and his neighbor/friend Steve was available on site if we needed anything.  This home is a private residence with personal art objects throughout.  We respected Laurent's request for certain personal objects that were off limits to guests.  The deck and large yard are also lovely and accessible. The yard amenities, as the trampoline and deck furniture, were much enjoyed.  
We definitely recommend this home for those who prefer a convenient, modern Bethesda location with a large, well-equipped kitchen, great room, private bedrooms with en suite baths, ambiance throughout the property and easy parking.

This Bethesda home was a great find for our family vacation. Laurent was flexible and responsive and ensured we had everything setup for our arrival (including milk, eggs, bread and cereal for first breakfast!). The place was amazing with a great art collection and lots to do as a family. It was just 20-25 mins to DC and would highly recommend to anyone with a large party for their DC vacation.

The house was beyond our expectations. My friends and me like the house space specifically the living room and the basement. The kitchen is fully equipped, and we enjoyed our breakfast in bright dining room. Laurent is a wonderful, well organized, and transparent host. I didn’t meet him physically since he was in Europe, but he emailed me back instantly whenever I need his help. Thanks Laurent! Keep the good job! I recommend the house for family and friends gathering, you will love it.

OMG , beautiful, wonderful, warm , inviting, cozy and more
We loved every min. of our stay 
Everything was more then we expected ,  so very happy Thank you Laurent

Lauren’t place is such a beautiful home that is both stylish and fun! It is also very spacious, simple gorgeous! I had high expectations from the pictures but can safely say that they were even exceeded when we arrived. The house is also very well located in a beautiful neighbourhood and close (by car) to all necessary amenities. It was the perfect location for our family reunion. Laurent is also a fantastic host, very easy to deal with, contributing to a very smooth and successful trip for us!  Can’t recommend enough!
Stunning house, equipped with everything we needed and above.

description.summary: Our home will give you all the comfort you can dream of. Located only 10 minutes walk from Bethesda Metro and city center, you are minutes away from vibrating DC while enjoying a quiet environment!
description.space:
Our home offers 6 independent bedrooms with 5 baths. It has many private spaces so each member can relax or have fun.
The living room is a huge open space that allows great family&friends diners.

Our home is powered by solar energy so we are proud to be green!
Our yard offers a bocce/petanque ball field, a trampoline, a firepit with enough to sit 8 to 10 people around it and swingers for kids.
description.neighborhood: Bethesda is a great DC neighborhood! Located 20 min away by metro or car, you will enjoy both the calm and green of the location together with a lovely downtown city center with all the food stores and restaurant you can dream of!
description.transit: Our house is located 10 min walk from the metro. Buses come in front of the house and will allow you to reach both downtown Bethesda in 3 min and DC in 25 minutes.
description.interaction: We will be delighted to help you with your stay and discover DC and its beautiful surroundings.
description.house_rules:
This is our primary residence and we want you to feel at home! Ask us for anything you would like to use.
We make our honey and have two beehives in the back yard. Our bees are italien docile bees. If you do not bother them they will not bother you!
It is our please to offer you some of our homemade honey! Let us know if you want some.

recent.comments: Very nice and quiet place. The room was clean, spacious  and well organized, bed was comfortable.  Quiet and peaceful surroundings.

items.comments: Very nice and quiet place. The room was clean, spacious  and well organized, bed was comfortable.  Quiet and peaceful surroundings.
Vera is a great host and her place is so cozy, clean, and comfortable. I would definitely stay at her place again when I’m back in the area and would highly recommend the place!

I had an absolutely fantastic time staying at Vera's place. The room was lovely, with a charming view over the golf course and a TV right by the bed. The kitchen was great, and I really enjoyed eating my breakfasts out on the deck in the mornings. I was also a fan of the gym in the neighbourhood. On top of everything else, Vera was really friendly, and made me feel very comfortable throughout my stay!
Great location, clean and spacious room with private bathroom.  Vera was very nice and accommodating. Would stay again!

Vera is a lovely, friendly hostess and always made me feel comfortable in her home. The place was always clean, tidy, and organized. I stayed here for 10 weeks for an internship and really appreciated how much at home I felt.

It was a great stay, good location close to grocery stores, restaurants and highways. The cleanliness in the house is good, equipped with everything you need and parking accessible. The room had attached bathroom, very spacious and good view from windows. The host communicated well and readily available when needed.
Vera is the perfect host. She was always available in case you need something. The house is beautiful, clean, tons of natural lights and amazing view from the room. Zero complaints!!

description.summary: Watch the sun rise over the golf course through floor-to-ceiling windows in a spacious master suite with a private bathroom. Located minutes from major highways, mall and shopping centers. Near Falls Church, Oakton, Vienna. Only 15 minutes from George Mason University (GMU) (5.9 miles), 30 minutes from the city (20 miles), 30 minutes from DCA airport (23 miles) , and 18 minutes to IAD airport (11 miles).
description.space:
This is a corner unit, two-story townhouse. The main floor is laid out with bamboo floors and a modern-decor throughout the living and dining room, with a half a bath for convenience. The cozy kitchen is fully stocked and comes with a gas stove, oven, toaster oven, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator and a large deck overlooking the golf course. 

The stairs and upstairs bedroom are carpeted. The suite is 18’x11.6’ with huge windows over the golf course facing East for that spectacular morning sunrise. The closet is 11.6’ long and provides shelving and hangers for your cloths. 

The bathroom has one sink and bathtub shower. Amenities included. 

The washer and dryer is located on the second floor. 

There is plenty of guest parking. Please park in “MEWS ONLY” areas.
description.access: Access is through the main door. To get to the main door there are three steps.
description.notes:
Please remove your shoes upon entering the house. 

You are welcome to use the kitchen for food preparation as long as you clean up after yourself. 

Please follow CDC guidelines for living in shared housing.
description.interaction: I am available for questions by phone, text or email. If there is a way that I can make your experience better, don’t hesitate to ask me. I’m here to help and host.
description.house_rules:
It rains a lot in VA. We ask that shoes are removed because a part of the house is carpeted.
Please turn off all lights and lock the front door before leaving the house.
Please do not keep any food in the bedroom.
Laundry hours are between 9am and 9pm. 
Quite hours are 10pm-8am.

recent.comments: Fantastic location and host. Exceedingly kind and communicative. Made us feel right at home!

items.comments: Fantastic location and host. Exceedingly kind and communicative. Made us feel right at home!

A beautiful home in a quiet, picturesque neighborhood. We travelled for my son’s school reunion, with a small baby, and this place felt like home. The host was very kind and responded fast. The kitchen deserves a special praise - very, very well equipped. Oh, and Chuchie left us welcoming treats which came very handy! Washington DC was very easy to get to and quick (under 17 min), and you cant find a stay like this in W DC for this money. Very grateful and very happy. Highly recommend!
If I could add another star to this review I would. Beautiful home and exceptional host. Amazing chefs kitchen stocked with everything you can image. Doesn’t get better than this!
Great place, host is very thoughtful and accommodating!
A spacious, clean, comfortable home in a nice neighborhood that served our family and friends well for our visit to the DC area. Would definitely return and recommend to others.

Great house - loved the gym, the spectacular kitchen, and the beautiful nature in the neighborhood. The place was spotless, well maintained and stocked with a bunch of very nice touches (snacks, masks, etc.) 

The house is in the flight path for one of the local airports, so you'll get plane noises every now and again, which isn't great. But other than that, zero complaints - a special property and a wonderful host.

We had a wonderful time here. It was a relaxing house to hang out and cook in close to a walking/running trail and a short drive to D.C. Glreat place to stay for large groups, I would highly recommend it!

description.summary: Impressive 4BR, 3BTH residence in highly sought-after, safe and quiet cul-de-sac with professional gourmet kitchen, hardwood floors, media room with 85-inch Sony 4K Ultra HD Smart TV and soundbar featuring premium home theater seating, rec room with professional-grade Rogue gym and 65-inch Sony 4K HD Smart TV, Sonos sound system, FIOS 5G WiFi, plenty of free parking and only 10-15 min from Washington DC, Clarendon and Tysons Corner.  This is the ideal home base for your trip to the DC area.
description.space: If you're looking for the ultimate destination for your upcoming family getaway or business trip, you can't go wrong with this magnificent Arlington vacation rental. This picturesque 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom house has a colonial-style exterior and packed with amenities.  Nestled in a very safe, residential neighborhood in sought-after North Arlington, this wonderful residence offers plenty of privacy, while still being just 15 minutes from the nation’s capital!  Free parking in private driveway for several cars.  Inviting media room with home theater seating and private gym.
description.access:
Entire house, which accommodates up to 7 people.  Four bedroom configuration: 1 king, 1 queen, 1 queen, 1 twin.

Memorial Day to Labor Day: Access to Donaldson Run Recreation Association, an exclusive community swimming pool with 25-meter pool, kiddie pool, basketball, volleyball, ping-pong and picnic area (guest passes must be purchased at the pool).
description.notes:
From the moment you first arrive, you will immediately be in awe of this picturesque 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom gem, situated in a private cul-de-sac tucked away from the hustle and bustle of city life.  With enough sleeping arrangements for up to 7 guests, this remarkable residence is perfect for families or a group of close friends exploring everything Virginia and Washington, DC have to offer.  

Inside, you’ll find the Southern-style home tastefully appointed with hardwood floors, as well as a gorgeous wrought iron staircase, tasteful decor and plenty of natural light throughout over 3,700 square feet of living space.  

Media room with 85-inch Sony 4K Ultra HD Smart TV and premium Italian-leather home theater seating offers inviting settings where you and your party can relax, watch a movie or catch the game.

Spacious rec room features professional-grade gym with top-of-the-line equipment from Rogue (including rack, barbell, trap bar, weight plates, dumbbells, kettle bells, battle ropes, bands, yoga mats, exercise ball, stationary bike, foam roller, ab wheel and more), 65-inch Sony 4K HD Smart TV with comfortable seating and corner office space with green screen for Zoom/video calls.

From subway tile backsplash, soft-close drawers and a huge island, to a 48-inch Wolf range stove with 6 burners and a griddle, a Sub-zero fridge and 4 top-of-the-line ovens, the professional gourmet kitchen comes fully equipped with everything a chef could need to prepare delicious meals.  In addition, the kitchen features a 40-inch HD Sony TV to keep the chef and friends entertained.  Choose to enjoy family meals around the huge mango-wood dining table that seats 12, or step outside to dine al fresco on the lovely patio, surrounded by beautiful trees.

Plenty of parking in private driveway and along the quiet street.
description.neighborhood:
Quiet cul-de-sac in safe, residential area in sought-after North Arlington provides serene setting, yet it's only 15 minutes from restaurants/shops in Clarendon and Tysons Corner areas.

Secluded hiking trail with creek and wild life is a 5-minute walk away and ideal for family walks, jogging and bicycling.  

Blue jays, cardinals and woodpeckers frequent the private back yard.  

Well-maintained public tennis courts are located a 5-minute drive away.
description.transit: Uber/Lyft widely available.  Nearest metro stop is 2.5 miles away (Ballston Station).
description.interaction:
After booking, see Guest Manual for pertinent details.

Note: Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request.
description.house_rules:
FOR STAYS LONGER THAN 6 NIGHTS, YOU MUST INQUIRE BEFORE BOOKING.

WAIVER OF LIABILITY FOR USE OF GYM AND EXERCISE EQUIPMENT:
By staying in the property, all guests hereby understand and acknowledge that the gym and exercise equipment at the property may expose them to many inherent risks, including accidents, injury, illness, or even death.  All guests assume all risk of injuries associated with their use of the gym and exercise equipment.

All guests agree, for themselves and anyone entitled to act on their behalf, to HOLD HARMLESS, WAIVE AND RELEASE the hosts and owners of the property from any responsibility, liabilities, demands, or claims of any kind arising out of their use of the gym and exercise equipment in the property. All guests are aware that this is a waiver and a release of liability, and voluntarily agree to its terms. 

SPECIAL EVENTS:
We welcome photo shoots and filming, but these activities must be approved in advanced by the host.  Any event (parties, receptions or similar gatherings) involving individuals besides the guests staying at the house must be approved in advance by the host and may be subject to an additional fee.

NO SMOKING:
Strictly no smoking inside of the house.  Non-compliant guests will be assessed a $750 cleaning fee.  If smoking outside, please do not leave cigarette butts visible in the yard or outside areas.  A $200 cleaning fee will be assessed if cigarette butts are visible inside or outside the house.

NO PETS:
No pets allowed.

NUMBER OF GUESTS:
Maximum number of guests is 7.  

VISITORS:
Any visitors to the property other than registered guests in your party (including, but not limited to, relatives, friends and co-workers) must be approved in writing in advance with the property owner and may be subject to an additional fee.  Failure to disclose visitors may result in the cancellation of your reservation and/or forfeiture of your security deposit.

LONG-TERM STAYS:
Long-term rentals are welcome.  Rentals longer than 1 week are welcome and encouraged, but you must inquire and receive approval before booking.

GUEST SAFETY:
For everyone's safety, the property has outside security cameras facing the front door, side door and back yard door (entry points into the house).  These cameras are always on.  Blocking or tampering with the cameras is against house rules and may result in the cancellation of your stay without a refund and/or forfeiture of your security deposit.

PRE-CHECK-OUT TASKS:
Please run the dishwasher and do not leave any dirty dishes in the sink or elsewhere in the property.  Please take out the trash to the bins on the driveway.  No need to remove bedding or wash towels.  Our cleaning crew will handle that.

EXTRA CLEANING FEE FOR EXCESS MESS:
Please be considerate.  When we visit other properties, we always treat them as if they are our own place.  PLEASE NOTE THAT AN ADDITIONAL CLEANING FEE OF $150 WILL BE ASSESSED IF YOU LEAVE THE PROPERTY IN AN OVERLY MESSY STATE, INCLUDING DIRTY DISHES.

Shanti Yoga Ashram 
location of airbnb room

yoga/satsang room

Beautiful space for yoga, meditation or just quiet time in the Main house of the Ashram, just across the bridge.
Feel free to join us for yoga, meditation or worship mornings and weekend evenings.

recent.comments: The place was very quiet and nice. I like how we get a private bathroom which is so much more convenient. Everyone there was also very nice. Overall it was a good stay!

items.comments: The place was very quiet and nice. I like how we get a private bathroom which is so much more convenient. Everyone there was also very nice. Overall it was a good stay!

Thanks to Lakshumi, Sarawati, Lisa, Rebecca, and Michael. All of the people I met are so nice and kind. The host was always willing to help and check whether you are okay. I had to focus on studying for the D.C bar exam and privacy was important. This place was perfect for me.

I needed a place to stay for some continuing education I was taking. The room was clean, comfortable, and quiet. The space was what would be expected from a yoga ashram. The people I ran into were pleasant. 
The host also was flexible, as I needed to check in really late at night, and she was willing to accommodate me. 
I'd stay here again.

I learned so much about what an ashram was, went to morning prayer which was complimentary and even did a couple yoga classes. It was a great place to live for a week as it offered peace admist the hustle and bustle of DC suburbia. Grateful to the ladies who live there.

Thank you to Lakshmi and Saraswati for the kind and warm welcome, and for this comfortable, peaceful stay in your yoga house center. If you are looking for a peaceful, clean, homey, comfortable place far frop the city buzz yet well located near the metro and in a nice, leafy neighborhood with great shops nearby, look no further! The added benefit is a real community feel and the freedom to attend yoga and other relaxation classes. Thank you for hosting me, and I hope to stay at your place again! All the best
Perfect stay, thank you!
A comfortable place where you can feel like at home!

description.summary:
Convenient to Washington DC metropolitan area and a walk to downtown Bethesda, MD and metro station (subway).   Beautiful sunny room with wifi, laptop-friendly workspace, master bath, mini-fridge, radiant-heat floor, single bed, closet.  Women only may stay in this room.

Common space includes washer/dryer, kitchenette for heating food with herbal teas, healthy coffee substitutes and filtered water.

home away from home.

The Women's Floor is restricted to biological women who identify as women.
description.space:
Live your dream to disconnect from the hectic--- and embrace the quiet, wholistic, healthy environment of a small ashram, where the inner life of the spirit is honored and nurtured.  

Shanti Yoga Ashram cultivates community through spiritual practices which include silence, vegetarianism, clean living, mindfulness, and community work, as well as the yoga and meditation that you might expect. 

As such, prudence and discretion in respecting the rules and reverent atmosphere of the Ashram is lovingly requested.  

Slow down and soak in the warmth of community with deep respect for the inner life which we cherish.

Covid Medical Exemptions in effect for some residents. Exemption friendly. If you have a similar need, please call to discuss.
description.access:
Make yourself comfortable on the front porch, when you come indoors, you can leave your shoes on the communal shoe rack at the front door. 

Access upstairs will be the first door on the right, and in two short flights you will discover the women's floor common area with sofa to your left, kitchenette and laundry room to your right.

Enjoy the peaceful yoga room in the Women's Residence and the beautiful yoga/meditation space at the Main House, next door. 

You are welcome to check out our scheduling and join in for yoga, prayers, meditation and other programming.
description.notes:
Shanti Yoga Ashram is a unique and beautiful combination of inner spiritual practice and community activism.  

As our guest, we hope you will soak up and thrive in the silence and mindfulness; and find love and enthusiasm for the way we nurture the larger community through our thriving CSA Program and our Healthy Meals outreach.  

Volunteers for these projects meet on the property two mornings a week, which can be a little busy in the parking lot and other parts of the home for a few hours. Activities on the first floor should not affect the women's living floor or the privacy of your room.

"Shanti" means "Peace"...and this space aspires to be an oasis of peace next to the hustle and bustle of the Washington, DC metro area, offering an environment that supports a balanced life providing both for the material and the spiritual.
description.neighborhood: The neighborhood is safe, beautiful, and quiet, with a natural foods shop close at hand, many nearby restaurants, cultural attractions, grocery stores, parks, and places of worship.
description.transit:
Safe neighborhood, and easy walk to the shops and restaurants at the heart of downtown Bethesda, 2 miles or one subway stop from NIH and Walter Reed Medical Center.

Just a 10-minute walk to metro station/metro rail, (Red line) and from there it is an easy ride to downtown Washington D.C, and all the iconic local attractions, as well as National and Dulles airports.  Metro bus (J2), Uber and Lyft are also readily available.  By car, we are 10 minutes away from interstate 495 and 270.
description.interaction:
Shanti Yoga Ashram is a small spiritual community with open doors for all those seeking a wholesome living space. While community life and our home businesses keep us well occupied, we are glad to offer assistance during your time here. 

The ashram has daily satsang (prayers and meditation), yoga classes, occasional events and ongoing service projects.  You are welcome to participate if you wish.
description.house_rules:
- Quiet hours 8:30 pm - 8:30 am.  Coming in after 8:30 pm is fine.  Prefer no phone calls after 8:30 pm to maintain quiet environment. If this might pose an inconvenience for you, please inquire during the booking process.  
- The Ashram is a lacto/ovo vegetarian community and requests no meat in the house, please.
- No smoking, alcohol, illegal drugs, or cannabis products on the premises.
- Clean up after oneself in shared spaces, keep personal things in your room.
-  If you plan to have visitors, let the host know and you may arrange (however, no overnight guests).
- Leave shoes at the door.
Thank You

hosts.about: I’m a retired CPA and I enjoy people and travel. My preferred mode is doing long-distance bike trips, when my back cooperates. We are both multigenerational Washingtonians and are glad to share tips and information on things to do and see in DC.

recent.comments:
Peter’s place is easily one of the best AirBnb experiences I’ve ever had. The house is in an absolutely gorgeous neighborhood, extremely rare for AirBnb in a house. Outside wonderful landscaping, inside very clean and tidy even though it’s a house that has raised a family and so feels so relaxing. The bed was very comfortable with a large, soft comforter and the shared bathroom absolutely spotless.

Peter and Genie are the “stars” of the experience as they are helpful, kind and very interesting to chat with. They offer breakfast, coffee and just overall nice hospitality. I plan to come again someday, the place and experience was so enjoyable!

items.comments:
Peter’s place is easily one of the best AirBnb experiences I’ve ever had. The house is in an absolutely gorgeous neighborhood, extremely rare for AirBnb in a house. Outside wonderful landscaping, inside very clean and tidy even though it’s a house that has raised a family and so feels so relaxing. The bed was very comfortable with a large, soft comforter and the shared bathroom absolutely spotless.

Peter and Genie are the “stars” of the experience as they are helpful, kind and very interesting to chat with. They offer breakfast, coffee and just overall nice hospitality. I plan to come again someday, the place and experience was so enjoyable!

Peter was a great conversationalist.
I really enjoyed staying in their place. Looking forward to see u guys again next time I visit DC!

I stayed for a week at Peter and Gennie's place and it felt right at home. They are both such wonderful people and great conversationalists. The neighborhood was so peaceful and quiet and tree-lined. I would definitely come back here when I am in the DC/Maryland area. And lastly - the coffee and breakfast are the cherry on top!

I greatly enjoyed my stay with Peter and Genie  - they provided a lovely yogurt, fruit, homemade granola, bread breakfast with a great latte, and a nice morning chat. I don't often meet my hosts so it was nice to talk with them about their hobbies/interests and their beautiful home! 

The room is on the top floor and can run a little hot at night - I let Peter know the next morning and by the time I returned there he had placed a box fan running up there to help cool it down. The Queen Charlotte bed is extremely plush and too soft for my back, so I will likely stay in another room next time, but the room is comfortable, bright, and has a desk for working. The bathroom is very tidy and clean with extra shampoo, conditioner, and soap, and I had it to myself during the stay. Shower pressure is great, as others have commented.

I'm looking forward to staying again!

My sister and I had a great 2 night stay at Peter’s place. The house is in a beautiful neighbourhood and within walking distance of the Metro, so very convenient for downtown and airport, etc. The bedroom on the third floor was very comfortable and quiet & the bathroom (shared with one other single room) is right beside the bedroom. Everything was spotlessly clean and the shower is great! Breakfast was a real treat including delicious homemade bread, homemade blueberry muffins and top notch coffee! Peter and Genie are really welcoming, friendly and helpful hosts who accommodated a late check-in, and then changed our bed linen as we’d forgotten to mention feather allergies when booking! Peter even dropped us to the station when we were leaving as we had large heavy suitcases. Description and pictures accurate. Would absolutely stay again whenever in DC - an exceptional AirBnB! Would give 6 stars if we could!

Best Airbnb experience I've ever had. Very safe neighborhood, close to the subway, and to DC. 

Peter & Ginnie are amazing hosts, very welcoming and helpful. Great breakfast as well!! :)

description.summary:
This bedroom is located on a separate floor, and is very quite. There's plenty of workspace for the working traveler and a recently renovated, modern bathroom. There is another bedroom across the hall, which is a mirror image of this bedroom. It has an extra-long single bed in it. It is not offered in this listing, but it is also available. See listing: 
https://abnb.me/IF1GWSf4kM

Also, there are two additional rooms on another floor each with double beds. Please inquire, if interested.
description.space: We live in a very walkable neighborhood and its historic designation comes from the fact that in the late 1800’s, it was among the first planned communities where people would live outside the city and commute downtown, via the streetcar, to work.
description.access: It’s our home and we’re very nice people. You’re welcome to enjoy it with us.
description.notes: We're coffee people with a commercial grade espresso machine (3 group La San Marco). If you are, too, and your schedule permits, I would be glad to get your day going with a nice cappuccino. Our breakfast is a delicious combination of homemade bread, homemade granola and (often homemade) yogurt served with fresh fruit.
description.neighborhood: We are located in the Historic District of Chevy Chase Village, a community of unique houses built in the late 1800s and early 1900s.
description.transit: The Metro Red line is approximately 1/2 mile away; Downtown Bethesda is approximately 1 mile away.
description.interaction:
We are lifelong Washingtonians and willing to share tips for getting around, exploring DC and places to eat. I also realize that you may not have come to DC to spend your day chatting me up. ;-)
We are friendly natives, too.
description.house_rules: We're pretty easy going people. I think reasonably and politely would cover the "house rules". We do ask that you don’t eat or drink beverages in your room.

recent.comments: My wife and our daughter spent a long weekend at Jennifer and Mike’s place in June. The house is gorgeous with all amenities you may wish for and a lovely backyard where we had breakfast and dinner most nights. Home away from home !

items.comments: My wife and our daughter spent a long weekend at Jennifer and Mike’s place in June. The house is gorgeous with all amenities you may wish for and a lovely backyard where we had breakfast and dinner most nights. Home away from home !

We immediately felt at home at Jennifer's place.  It's clean, tastefully decorated, high standard.  The two beds are amazingly comfortable, the sheets of high quality, and there are various types of pillows on the beds, so each person can easily find the one they need for a good night's sleep. The AC in the house works perfectly, albeit a little noisy in the master bedroom, but it's like white noise and puts you to sleep. The outside area is wonderful, and at night magical with the cute lights. However, the property sits underneath a direct flight path to DCA, and at times it can be a plane every two minutes directly overhead, which is very noisy. You can also hear it early in the morning, so if you are a light sleeper, it might wake you up. Other than that, the place is wonderful, and Jenn was extremely quick to respond to any concerns we had. We also had an amazing check-out time of 4PM!! Where can you get that? :) Thank you, Jennifer!

Jennifer was a wonderful host and made us feel at home. She was so easy to communicate with and had the best recommendations for restaurants. The home was beautiful in a quiet neighborhood and was within walking distance to town. As well as being beautiful, the place was very clean, modern and had nice bedrooms and bathrooms as well as a gorgeous kitchen that looked as if it was newly remodeled. We would highly recommend this wonderful home. Thank you for a memorable stay.

An attractive, spacious and welcoming environment where our family felt at home and comfortable. The back garden was a terrific plus on a warm autumn weekend. The quiet neighborhood was appealing and civilized. Jennifer was a terrific and readily available host. Thank you for a successful and happy stay.
Jennifer’s house is very charming and well located. She was helpful and kind. I really recommend it.

Jennifer's house was one of the nicest we've stayed in.  The house layout was very convenient for us.  First floor entry and half bathroom and hang out room which we didn't use but nice to have. The second floor--kitchen, dining and living room was bright, beautiful, very relaxing and immaculate. The third floor had two beds and two baths. Perfect for the three of us. There is a great restaurant/coffee shop right down the block.  There are public tennis courts, bike share and a park nearby. We appreciated that Jennifer was great at communicating and accomodated a last minute change.
Beautiful place, phenomenal location, and helpful host!!!

description.summary: Our fully renovated townhouse is in the Georgetown/Palisades neighborhood of Northwest DC. It’s within walking distance (less than 1 mile) to M Street/Georgetown Waterfront and very close to Georgetown University & Hospital. Easy access to downtown DC, VA & MD. European Market is just down the street (great for coffee & pizza), Jetties is around the corner (great for salads/sandwiches), and the C&O Canal trails are close by (great for biking/running).
description.space: Our stately Federal-style townhouse is a 2-3 bedroom home with 3 full bathrooms. Renovated in 2013, we have a fantastic open floor plan, great layout for living/entertaining, high-end appliances, and hardwood floors throughout. There are 2 huge bedrooms on the top floor (with a King Bed and Queen Bed), each with their own private full bathroom. The first floor den can also serve as a third bedroom (Queen-sized air mattress and comfy sectional couch), along with a gas fireplace and full bathroom. There are beautiful French doors that access our deep fenced-in yard, complete with patio, Weber grill and wood-burning fire pit. Parking is available in the driveway or on the street. As this is our primary residence, please note that there are personal belongings in the closets and drawers, and groceries in the fridge and pantry. However, we have done our best to make room for our guests!
description.access: Everywhere, except the one-car garage (which is being used for storage).
description.notes: We prefer to host couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
description.neighborhood: The Palisades is known for its tree-lined streets and small-town character. The area is predominately residential, but MacArthur Boulevard is the neighborhood’s commercial strip. It is lined with restaurants and shops, and it’s very walkable. This part of the city really doesn’t look like it’s part of a city at all– it really feels like a small town tucked away in a beautiful natural area. The people who live in this area don’t necessarily look like many other DC residents either: the Palisades is home to an overwhelmingly culturally diverse population, with a lot more families with young children and pets than you’d see in other neighborhoods.
description.transit: The Palisades is served by Metrobus lines D3, D5, D6, and M4. For those driving, renting cars or using Uber/Lyft, the Key Bridge is close by — leading to the George Washington Parkway, I-66, and Route 50 — and driving to downtown DC, over the Potomac River to Arlington, or up to Bethesda is quite easy. The closest Metro train stations are Rosslyn (the first stop in Virginia for Orange, Silver and Blue Line trains and is a major stop for Metrobus Route 5A to Dulles International Airport) and Foggy Bottom-GWU (located on the George Washington University campus, this station sits under the George Washington University Hospital and is walking or biking distance to the Georgetown/M Street corridor).
description.interaction: Please send us a message through Airbnb if there’s anything that you need!

Very grateful for her going above and beyond with getting us an outdoor fire pit with wood neatly stacked, privet grill access, new vacuum cleaner, and complementary bottles of wine.... just to name a few. Wonderful location. Felt safe. All the amenities provided. She’s a very sweet lady and an exceptional host. So happy our paths crossed!

description.summary:

description.summary:
Find the best of city conveniences and suburban comfort here at Reston Town Center. Set above the high-end shops and restaurants of this outdoor mall, these apartments are ideal for any trip to the D.C. area. What makes them stand out?

- Fabulous location at Reston Town Center within walking distance of Reston’s top things to do
- Spacious floor plans with huge windows and hardwood floors
- Gourmet kitchens with stainless steel appliances
- Luxurious hotel-like amenities
description.space:
Welcome to friendly Reston, Virginia, a charming corner of the sprawling D.C. metro area known for the lively Reston Town Center. Perched just a stone’s throw from a slew of great restaurants, upscale shopping, and convenient essentials, this modern building has it all.

Greet the beautiful D.C. day from your quiet, private bedroom. In addition to a plush mattress, you’ll find high-end wood furnishings, Quartz countertops, Plenty of natural light, and ample closet space to really make you feel at home. Unpack and stay a while!

Whether your days are filled with meetings, family visits, or tours of D.C.’s most popular attractions, you’ll undoubtedly work up an appetite. If a casual night at home is in the cards, take advantage of the stunning chef’s kitchen and whip up a delicious meal. The premium stainless steel appliances include a full-size fridge and freezer, electric stove, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. As for the drawers and cabinets, They're fully stocked with the essential cookware and bakeware to do so! Don’t feel like cooking? You’ll find a mouthwatering array of restaurants at Reston Town Center.

The kitchen, dining room, and living room blend together effortlessly, thanks to the open floor plan and sophisticated wood floors. Here, there’s plenty of room to relax, so kick back on the couch or stream your favorite show for the perfect night in.

Complete apartment amenities include:
• Fully-Equipped kitchen
• Flat-screen TV
• Washer and dryer
• High speed wireless internet
• Heat and air conditioning
• Linens and towels
• Large Windows
• High Ceilings
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Quartz Countertops
• Sleek Chrome Fixtures
• Pendant Lighting In The Kitchen

In addition to your spacious apartment, the building amenities offer plenty of on-site entertainment choices for any time of year. During the sunny D.C. summers, nothing beats a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or a lazy day on the rooftop terrace. Looking for a cozy place to read, work, or catch up with a friend? Look no further than the resident lounge or the productivity-inspiring business center.

There are plenty of ways to stay busy without even leaving the building. Visit the various building lounges, try your hand at Billiards, Shuffleboard, or Foosball,  and work up a sweat in the buildings extensive fitness center! Looking for another exercise option? Head south just a couple blocks to the Washington and Old Dominion Trail, which stretches for miles and is perfect for running or walking.

The full package of building amenities contains:
• Rooftop terrace
• Outdoor Pool with Cabanas 
• Serenity Filled Courtyard
• Outdoor Grilling and Picnic Area
• Outdoor Fountains
• Fully Landscaped Patio
• Fitness center
• Yoga Studio
• Lobby Lounge with Fireplace 
• Demonstration kitchen
• Game room with Pool Table, Shuffleboard, and Foosball
• Resident lounge
• Business center
• Meeting Room

Experience suburban living at its finest, just a 10-minute drive from Washington Dulles Airport and a 30-minute drive from the heart of Washington, D.C. With the shops and restaurants of Reston Town Center at your doorstep, you’ll have all the conveniences of a big city within a few steps - plus the natural beauty of Lake Anne and Lake Fairfax Park at your fingertips.

description.notes:
Please see the house rules.
Please note, all guests are required to wear a mask in all non-private areas at all times. This means the moment you open your unit door to leave, and up to the moment, you close the door, after entering.

At Global Luxury Suites, your wellbeing is our top priority, therefore, we are following the CDC guidelines to ensure your safety. All apartments are thoroughly cleaned after each resident has checked out and before another guest checks in. All linens are changed and surfaces are sanitized (handles, windows, appliances, countertops, furniture, etc.). In addition, our teams will be fully sanitizing common areas such as business centers and recreation rooms for guests’ safety.

ensuite bath with shower & double sinks
Screened porch - lovely spot to have coffee or work on your laptop.

hosts.about: I love hosting guests and want to make sure your visit is comfortable and memorable.

recent.comments: My husband and I stayed at Kristin's house a couple nights. We felt welcomed by Kristin and enjoyed talking with her. She is a kind and respectful host, and her home is peaceful, cozy and spotless. Very comfortable bed and soft linens, amazing water pressure in the shower. While we weren't at the house much because we were off doing things, it was a peaceful place to come back to and really enjoyed our coffee on the screened in deck. Would absolutely stay here again.

items.comments: My husband and I stayed at Kristin's house a couple nights. We felt welcomed by Kristin and enjoyed talking with her. She is a kind and respectful host, and her home is peaceful, cozy and spotless. Very comfortable bed and soft linens, amazing water pressure in the shower. While we weren't at the house much because we were off doing things, it was a peaceful place to come back to and really enjoyed our coffee on the screened in deck. Would absolutely stay here again.

This is my first-time experience staying in an Airbnb apartment/house. Kristin is a wonderful human being and she made me feel like my own home. The hospitality shown by her was great. She is a very friendly,  experienced, systematic, and organized person with so much knowledge about the place and the surrounding areas, and guided me very well to explore the nearby places. Kristin's place is located in a beautiful landscape with a peaceful neighborhood. To tell about her place, it is a beautiful well-designed house with well equipped modern kitchen, bedroom, living area and very clean bathroom.  She offered me all the required kitchen equipment, cooking ingredients and also taught me how to use those. Overall, the stay was pleasant and I loved it. I wish to come and stay again in her place.

If you don’t know Chevy Chase it’s a lovely safe, beautiful residential area. Kirstin’s home is spacious, comfortable and stylish. She is extremely personable and had pearls of wisdom to offer us on our own renovations. The room within her home had a spacious closet and grand bathroom. Parking on the street was easy.
Beautiful house, wonderful neighborhood, and fantastic host!

Kristin is a very friendly host. The location is conveniently located within walking distance from the Bethesda Metro Station and DC downtown is very short ride from there.
Great value. I would like to recommend it to anyone who is visiting the DC area.
Wonderful place to stay.  Kristin's thoughtfulness and communication is refreshing.
Kristin is a wonderful host and she has a beautiful home. I had a great stay. Highly recommended.

Additional rooms may be available at an additional charge.

description.summary:
Find the best of city conveniences and suburban comfort here at Reston Town Center. Set above the high-end shops and restaurants of this outdoor mall, these apartments are ideal for any trip to the D.C. area. What makes them stand out?

- Fabulous location at Reston Town Center within walking distance of Reston’s top things to do
- Spacious floor plans with huge windows and hardwood floors
- Gourmet kitchens with stainless steel appliances
- Luxurious hotel-like amenities
description.space:
Welcome to friendly Reston, Virginia, a charming corner of the sprawling D.C. metro area known for the lively Reston Town Center. Perched just a stone’s throw from a slew of great restaurants, upscale shopping, and convenient essentials, this modern building has it all.

Greet the beautiful D.C. day from your quiet, private bedroom. In addition to a plush mattress, you’ll find high-end wood furnishings, Quartz countertops, Plenty of natural light, and ample closet space to really make you feel at home. Unpack and stay a while!

Whether your days are filled with meetings, family visits, or tours of D.C.’s most popular attractions, you’ll undoubtedly work up an appetite. If a casual night at home is in the cards, take advantage of the stunning chef’s kitchen and whip up a delicious meal. The premium stainless steel appliances include a full-size fridge and freezer, electric stove, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. As for the drawers and cabinets, They're fully stocked with the essential cookware and bakeware to do so! Don’t feel like cooking? You’ll find a mouthwatering array of restaurants at Reston Town Center.

The kitchen, dining room, and living room blend together effortlessly, thanks to the open floor plan and sophisticated wood floors. Here, there’s plenty of room to relax, so kick back on the couch or stream your favorite show for the perfect night in.

Complete apartment amenities include:
• Fully-Equipped kitchen
• Flat-screen TV
• Washer and dryer
• High speed wireless internet
• Heat and air conditioning
• Linens and towels
• Large Windows
• High Ceilings
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Quartz Countertops
• Sleek Chrome Fixtures
• Pendant Lighting In The Kitchen

In addition to your spacious apartment, the building amenities offer plenty of on-site entertainment choices for any time of year. During the sunny D.C. summers, nothing beats a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or a lazy day on the rooftop terrace. Looking for a cozy place to read, work, or catch up with a friend? Look no further than the resident lounge or the productivity-inspiring business center.

There are plenty of ways to stay busy without even leaving the building. Visit the various building lounges, try your hand at Billiards, Shuffleboard, or Foosball,  and work up a sweat in the buildings extensive fitness center! Looking for another exercise option? Head south just a couple blocks to the Washington and Old Dominion Trail, which stretches for miles and is perfect for running or walking.

The full package of building amenities contains:
• Rooftop terrace
• Outdoor Pool with Cabanas 
• Serenity Filled Courtyard
• Outdoor Grilling and Picnic Area
• Outdoor Fountains
• Fully Landscaped Patio
• Fitness center
• Yoga Studio
• Lobby Lounge with Fireplace 
• Demonstration kitchen
• Game room with Pool Table, Shuffleboard, and Foosball
• Resident lounge
• Business center
• Meeting Room

Experience suburban living at its finest, just a 10-minute drive from Washington Dulles Airport and a 30-minute drive from the heart of Washington, D.C. With the shops and restaurants of Reston Town Center at your doorstep, you’ll have all the conveniences of a big city within a few steps - plus the natural beauty of Lake Anne and Lake Fairfax Park at your fingertips.

title: Chevy Chase, Maryland, US, Maryland

location.address: Chevy Chase, Maryland, US, MD, United States

gallery.caption: Our home. It’s been in our family for five generations and we’re happy to share it with you .
Firm Queen bed. Bedroom has an en suite bathroom
Very large family room, which is everyone’s favorite room.
Renovated bathroom with handmade-by-me walnut vanity.
Rear yard, woods, and golf course.
Lovely screened porch overlooking woods and golf course. Everyone's favorite room and the perfect place for al fresco breakfast.
This separate bedroom, while not part of this listing, is also available in combination with it. See Airbnb listing: https://www.airbnb.com/manage-your-space/15998418/details

hosts.about: I’m a retired CPA and I enjoy people and travel. My preferred mode is doing long-distance bike trips, when my back cooperates. We are both multigenerational Washingtonians and are glad to share tips and information on things to do and see in DC.

recent.comments: Peter and Genie are warm, kind, and caring and I felt very welcomed by them. Their home is beautiful and spacious, and the room I stayed in and attached bathroom was super clean and comfortable, with a lot of natural light. The neighbourhood is serene and the bus / train into town is a lovely 15minute walk away (I feel so happy to have visited in spring when all the blossoms in the neighbourhood were in bloom).  What a great stay, highly recommended!

items.comments: Peter and Genie are warm, kind, and caring and I felt very welcomed by them. Their home is beautiful and spacious, and the room I stayed in and attached bathroom was super clean and comfortable, with a lot of natural light. The neighbourhood is serene and the bus / train into town is a lovely 15minute walk away (I feel so happy to have visited in spring when all the blossoms in the neighbourhood were in bloom).  What a great stay, highly recommended!
A really charming place in an absolutely lovely neighborhood! Honestly, Chevy Chase might be the most picturesque town I’ve ever visited. Peter was a great host and I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Peter and Genie were very friendly and helpful! It was like staying with family. Their neighborhood is beautiful and close to some nice restaurants.

One of the best B&B’s we’re have ever been to.  Great property, great location. Room was perfect. Peter is an incredible host.  Friendly and personable. Coffee the best!  Wish we could have stayed longer.  But will be back.

Lovely, quiet house located in a tree-lined neighborhood in Chevy Chase. The home itself is large and airy with plenty of privacy for guests (we had the entire second floor to ourselves). We stayed in a beautiful room with an en-suite architect’s bathroom. I can be quite picky about showers and beds and this place is definitely a 10/10. Peter and Genie are friendly, knowledgeable people that are great fun to get to know. They are also incredibly kind and helpful and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a place to stay in DC.

Peter and Genie are amazing host. I enjoyed my stay at their lovely house. Very cozy and clean and quiet. I could meet many nice people in the morning and evening. They are so kind and considerate. 
If I visit DC again, definitely I will stay peter's house again.
Many thanks, Peter and Genie.

We had a lovely stay at Peters airbnb.  We were picking up my son from American University, and its about a ten minute drive, so very convenient.  Peter is a great host and we had a yummy breakfast.  Thank you Peter!

description.summary: Quiet room in historic Chevy Chase Village neighborhood. We are located in an historic district with an easy walk to the Friendship Heights metro station (red line), which allows easy access to all the points in Washington. Chevy Chase Village is a very safe neighborhood, adjoining Washington, DC, with its own police department and local government office. Easy access to Metro, restaurants and shopping. Downtown Bethesda is approximately 1 mile away.
description.space: We live in a very walkable neighborhood and its historic designation comes from the fact that in the late 1800’s, it was among the first planned communities where people would live outside the city and commute downtown, via the streetcar, to work.
description.access: It’s our home and we’re very nice people. You’re welcome to enjoy it with us.
description.notes: We're coffee people with a commercial grade espresso machine (3 group La San Marco). If you are, too, and your schedule permits, I would be glad to get your day going with a nice cappuccino.
description.neighborhood: Our home is located in an historic district, recognized for its architecture, history and location in the development of Washington. It has been in our family for five generations.
description.transit: There's plenty of parking and the public transportation is abundant.
description.interaction:
We are lifelong Washingtonians and willing to share tips for getting around, exploring DC and places to eat. I also realize that you may not have come to DC to spend your day chatting me up. ;-)
We are friendly natives, too.
description.house_rules: We're pretty easy going people. I think reasonably and politely would cover the "house rules". We do ask that you don’t eat or drink beverages in your room.

name: Private Room (No. 1) at The Little River Inn
title: Aldie, Virginia

gallery.caption: Hallway and stairs outside of the room
Dining area next to the kitchen
View of the Inn from the back
We love to keep fresh flowers around

hosts.about:
Our names are Tucker and Mary Ann Withers. We live in the village of Aldie and have been running the Little River Inn for 38 years. We love antiquing, traveling and spending time with our three children, their significant others and our grandchild. We love hosting guests and friends at the inn and sharing our love for Aldie when they visit. At the Inn, a full breakfast is included in your stay, we use local meats, eggs and serve everything from French toast, to quiche, to Dutch apple baby. The Little River Inn features beautiful rooms decorated with antiques, quilts, hooked and braided rugs, spool beds and 19th-century paintings. The Main House features a sitting room with a fireplace, a patio, porches, two breakfast rooms and a spacious yard our donkeys, Milo and Racer, call home. Located across the driveway from the Main House, the Patent House and Log Cabin are free standing cottages that feature full baths and living rooms and working fireplaces. We serve a full breakfast at 8:30 a.m. every day, prepared from scratch by chef Tucker.

Established in 1982.

After moving to Aldie, Tucker learned that his great-uncle’s house was for sale, though the buildings were in poor condition, he decided it would be the perfect Bed and Breakfast. Tucker restored the Main house and cabins, while keeping the charm of the historic property, welcoming the first guests in 1982.

recent.comments: We loved our stay. Great hosts!

items.comments: We loved our stay. Great hosts!
Lovely little location! My room was comfortable and clean, and breakfast was lovely. Would absolutely recommend!
Mary Ann and Tucker are the place to stay for Middleburg weddings! We’ve stayed here twice and both times were excellent.
This was my second stay at Little River Inn - highly recommend! I’m sure I’ll continue coming back to this sweet spot.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at this historic gem of an inn.  I felt transported to a simpler time where I was able to settle in, get cozy and curl up with a good book.  I had a great sleep, a hot shower and a terrific breakfast by Tucker.  I could have talked to him all day about the area and its history.  I will definitely be back!
Charming spot. Great location. very good food.
very good location for wineries and for visiting Middleburg...place is close to road so there is some traffic noise.

description.summary: Room 1 is in the Main House of the Little River inn in Aldie, Virginia and we have been in business for 38 years. A full breakfast is included in your stay; we use local meats, eggs and serve everything from French toast, to quiche, to Dutch apple baby. Room 1 is the only bedroom on the first floor of the main house and there are additional private bedrooms upstairs. A living room, two dining areas, and the kitchen are on the main floor as well.
description.space: Guests are welcome to explore the town of Aldie and of course feed carrots/apples to the donkeys that live behind the Inn!
description.neighborhood: Located in Aldie is an antique shop also run by your hosts, which is called Mercer Tavern Antiques. Greenheart juice shop and the Aldie General Store and Cafe are also located within walking distance. The Little River Inn is located 5 miles east of Middleburg, Virginia, the heart of Virginia’s hunt and horse country. Whether it’s a wine tasting at one of the many vineyards, eating at one of the region’s fine restaurants, taking a tour of a world-class horse farm, shopping in downtown Middleburg, visiting a civil war battlefield or just relaxing in the clean country air, you will find that there is something here for everyone!
description.transit: Ubers and Lyfts are in the area, as well as private drivers and party buses.
description.interaction: We live in the town of Aldie and are available by phone if you need help or have questions!

description.summary: Stay in the heart of the Village in this stylish recently renovated private home. The lower level suite includes a Queen bedroom and full bathroom, laundry room with refrig, and sunny living room with Frame smart TV. Located in leafy Chevy Chase with close proximity to Rock Creek, Beltway, Friendship Heights, Bethesda, and a scenic ride or drive past the zoo to all the downtown D.C attractions.
description.space:
Our newly renovated basement studio includes all the comforts of your own home. The brand new luxury bathroom boasts Matouk bed linens, a walk in shower with oversized sink, and comfy queen bed that's nestled in a separate area of the floor for privacy and coziness, plus a newly appointed sofa in the living area provides extra space to sleep, and space for a pack n play crib or air mattress is available.

There is a fully equipped laundry room, fridge/freezer, sink, toaster, and coffee-machine. There is fast 5G WiFi and a Smart TV with Netflix, etc. Private pathway leading to private entrance, driveway parking for one vehicle. Gated side yard for bikes.
description.access: The guest suite, side and back yard and driveway.
description.notes:
The owner may or may not be in residence upstairs. If present, we have one small hypoallergenic dog who can’t decide. If you or your pre-agreed pet meet her she is sweet and friendly.

***Please note that any stay 14 nights or longer will require an extra mid stay cleaning which will be paid by the guest. Reach out to us before booking long term stays.
description.neighborhood: Walk through the neighborhood to the local market where you can stock up on delicious food and wine, and pop to the adjacent Farmer's Market on Saturday mornings. La Ferme a beautiful French restaurant, Olympia diner, a dry cleaner, pharmacy and dog park are all a block away at your fingertips. I love it here and hope you will too.

recent.comments:
Overall great stay. This unit is run by GLS like others advertised in the building. So yes there is some additional paperwork but nothing over the top. Just remember to sign up for parking ahead of time if needed. (No issues with the parking deck either - took van in no probs w maneuverability.) The company has an app but I found I didn’t need to use it. All communication was done by email with very prompt responses from the company staff. 

I did receive the unit pictured and it was VERY clean. Couldn’t have been happier with the stay. Location was excellent as well. You do need to meet with a representative from GLS for the key handoff at the designated time. But she met with us an hour earlier than check in with no issue.  Would definitely stay again.

Overall great stay. This unit is run by GLS like others advertised in the building. So yes there is some additional paperwork but nothing over the top. Just remember to sign up for parking ahead of time if needed. (No issues with the parking deck either - took van in no probs w maneuverability.) The company has an app but I found I didn’t need to use it. All communication was done by email with very prompt responses from the company staff. 

I did receive the unit pictured and it was VERY clean. Couldn’t have been happier with the stay. Location was excellent as well. You do need to meet with a representative from GLS for the key handoff at the designated time. But she met with us an hour earlier than check in with no issue.  Would definitely stay again.

Welcome to friendly Reston, Virginia, a charming corner of the sprawling D.C. metro area known for the lively Reston Town Center. Perched just a stone’s throw from a slew of great restaurants, upscale shopping, and convenient essentials, this modern building has it all.

Greet the beautiful D.C. day from your quiet, private bedroom. In addition to a plush mattress, you’ll find high-end wood furnishings, Quartz countertops, Plenty of natural light, and ample closet space to really make you feel at home. Unpack and stay a while!

Whether your days are filled with meetings, family visits, or tours of D.C.’s most popular attractions, you’ll undoubtedly work up an appetite. If a casual night at home is in the cards, take advantage of the stunning chef’s kitchen and whip up a delicious meal. The premium stainless steel appliances include a full-size fridge and freezer, electric stove, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. As for the drawers and cabinets, They're fully stocked with the essential cookware and bakeware to do so! Don’t feel like cooking? You’ll find a mouthwatering array of restaurants at Reston Town Center.

The kitchen, dining room, and living room blend together effortlessly, thanks to the open floor plan and sophisticated wood floors. Here, there’s plenty of room to relax, so kick back on the couch or stream your favorite show for the perfect night in.

Complete apartment amenities include:
• Fully-Equipped kitchen
• Flat-screen TV

• Heat and air conditioning

In addition to your spacious apartment, the building amenities offer plenty of on-site entertainment choices for any time of year. During the sunny D.C. summers, nothing beats a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or a lazy day on the rooftop terrace. Looking for a cozy place to read, work, or catch up with a friend? Look no further than the resident lounge or the productivity-inspiring business center.

There are plenty of ways to stay busy without even leaving the building.
