name: Oaks B&B - lovely, upscale, private wooded near DC
title: Bethesda, Maryland

gallery.caption: The Chardonnay Executive Suite with roof top deck

recent.comments: This place is exquisite. I did a four day marathon dissertation writing retreat here. It was a huge success. I left having finished chapters 1-3. The room I stayed in was perfect (The Rose room). So many little, but beautiful, touches- from the art work to the candles and chocolate. I did my research and wrote daily in one of the cozy and elegant living rooms. My backdrop was a warm fireplace and a beautifully lit Christmas tree. I was able to take a walk and enjoy nature in the wooded neighborhood. The hosts, Sharon and Quinton were beyond accommodating and professional. Each morning I was served a five star breakfast and in the early evenings I enjoyed the wine hours. The wine selection is vast. Leaving was difficult. The hosts truly enjoy having and serving their guests and it resonates in all they do.  I highly recommend this lovely upscale  bed and breakfast. I will be back, for sure. Next time for a romantic getaway.

items.comments: This place is exquisite. I did a four day marathon dissertation writing retreat here. It was a huge success. I left having finished chapters 1-3. The room I stayed in was perfect (The Rose room). So many little, but beautiful, touches- from the art work to the candles and chocolate. I did my research and wrote daily in one of the cozy and elegant living rooms. My backdrop was a warm fireplace and a beautifully lit Christmas tree. I was able to take a walk and enjoy nature in the wooded neighborhood. The hosts, Sharon and Quinton were beyond accommodating and professional. Each morning I was served a five star breakfast and in the early evenings I enjoyed the wine hours. The wine selection is vast. Leaving was difficult. The hosts truly enjoy having and serving their guests and it resonates in all they do.  I highly recommend this lovely upscale  bed and breakfast. I will be back, for sure. Next time for a romantic getaway.

Amazing stay! The proprietors are kind and generous!! I had such a good time in solitude and in the (socially distant) company of others amid my stay. Breakfast was top notch, the stuff of DC brunch legend. The neighborhood was great for an outdoor run! The backyard allowed for some staring at the moon while enjoying a nice fire and whisky! It was a really great, relaxing, and refreshing stay! I enjoyed all of the touches and amenities from snacks and wine to candles and housekeeping. Can’t rave on it enough, as it was also my first bed and breakfast experience. Very cool! May be hard to beat! Looking forward to staying again the next time I need a little retreat from the city for a few days!

description.summary: Fabulous B&B. Chardonnay Executive En-Suite with rooftop deck plus access to common areas. Sleeps 3-4 people in 2 beds and pull out sofa. WiFi, TV, fridge, Keurig. Six other luxe suites may be booked separately upon availability. All are en-suites and perfect for romantic get-a-ways, retreats, bridal showers and business travelers and families. Free parking. Less than a mile from highway 270/495; 5 miles from D.C. bus/metro, great restaurants/shopping. Steps to Cabin John Trail & scenic areas.
description.space: #oaksbnb
description.neighborhood: Scenic, tranquil wooded setting. Cabin John Trail is steps away; Billy Goat Trail is five minutes away; Glen Echo Park, C&O canal and the Potomac River are all nearby. Fun hiking, biking, walking and running trails. Public ice skating rink, Westfield Montgomery Mall  and Tysons Corner Malls are nearby. 10 minute drive to both DC and VA.
description.transit: Free on-site parking. Local bus stop is on the corner and goes to the Metro train station red-line.
description.house_rules: Select the room you would like in the notes/message section. Separate bookings for each room is required.

description.space:
Welcome to friendly Reston, Virginia, a charming corner of the sprawling D.C. metro area known for the lively Reston Town Center. Perched just a stone’s throw from a slew of great restaurants, upscale shopping, and convenient essentials, this modern building has it all.

Greet the beautiful D.C. day from your quiet, private bedroom. In addition to a plush mattress, you’ll find high-end wood furnishings, Quartz countertops, Plenty of natural light, and ample closet space to really make you feel at home. Unpack and stay a while!

Whether your days are filled with meetings, family visits, or tours of D.C.’s most popular attractions, you’ll undoubtedly work up an appetite. If a casual night at home is in the cards, take advantage of the stunning chef’s kitchen and whip up a delicious meal. The premium stainless steel appliances include a full-size fridge and freezer, electric stove, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. As for the drawers and cabinets, They're fully stocked with the essential cookware and bakeware to do so! Don’t feel like cooking? You’ll find a mouthwatering array of restaurants at Reston Town Center.

The kitchen, dining room, and living room blend together effortlessly, thanks to the open floor plan and sophisticated wood floors. Here, there’s plenty of room to relax, so kick back on the couch or stream your favorite show for the perfect night in.

Complete apartment amenities include:
• Fully-Equipped kitchen
• Flat-screen TV
• Washer and dryer
• High speed wireless internet
• Heat and air conditioning
• Linens and towels
• Large Windows
• High Ceilings
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Quartz Countertops
• Sleek Chrome Fixtures
• Pendant Lighting In The Kitchen

In addition to your spacious apartment, the building amenities offer plenty of on-site entertainment choices for any time of year. During the sunny D.C. summers, nothing beats a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or a lazy day on the rooftop terrace. Looking for a cozy place to read, work, or catch up with a friend? Look no further than the resident lounge or the productivity-inspiring business center.

There are plenty of ways to stay busy without even leaving the building. Visit the various building lounges, try your hand at Billiards, Shuffleboard, or Foosball,  and work up a sweat in the buildings extensive fitness center! Looking for another exercise option? Head south just a couple blocks to the Washington and Old Dominion Trail, which stretches for miles and is perfect for running or walking.
